title: Reflections on a late libel intituled, Observations on a late famous sermon intituled, Curse ye Meroz in a letter to our old friend, R.L.
author: Hickeringill, Edmund, 1631-1708.
notes: Signed at end: A.B., [i.e., Edmund Hickeringill]. Cf. BM.
Also published as: A vindication of the late sermon on--Curse ye Meroz. 1680.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Hugh Peters's sermon upon Judg. 5.23. Curse ye Meroz" [a poem]: p. 39-44.
